body.p: To show all employees in a unit, leave the name/phone number-field blank.
PO Box 8114 Dep. N-0032 Oslo Norway Street address: 7. juni-plassen/ Victoria Terrasse Oslo ( download city map )
you can use this form to send questions or comments to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

Emails sent to The Ministry of Foreign Affairs will be dealt with in accordance with the provisions of the Freedom of Information Act (Act of 19 June 1970 No. 69 relating to public access to documents in the public administration), in the same way as normal mail. This means that you should expect the contents of your message to be made publicly available. Accordingly, you should not send messages containing personal or other information you do not wish to become public.
